```{r}
library(readr); library(dplyr); library(stringr); library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
libraryData <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/library100_102.csv")
```

```{r}
libraryData %>%
  mutate_art(
    vars(學院，書籍觀藏地，書籍類別)，
    funs(
      as.factor(.)
    )
  ) -> libraryData

libraryData %>%
  mutate(
    借閱時間=ymd_hms(借閱時間，tz="Asia/Taipei")
  ) -> libraryData
```
